channel.title: Comments on: Atomic Wallet November Report

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: We arw looking for more good announcements from Atomic team along with new features such as borrow or lending options. Please let us know if there any plan to launch such features or any other features.
item.content:encoded: We arw looking for more good announcements from Atomic team along with new features such as borrow or lending options. Please let us know if there any plan to launch such features or any other features.

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: I hope the team can implement a feature where we can directly generate a personal invite link on the mobile app. It would help in the promotional campaigns.
item.content:encoded: I hope the team can implement a feature where we can directly generate a personal invite link on the mobile app. It would help in the promotional campaigns.

item.title: By: CryptoP
item.dc:creator: CryptoP
item.description: Your team I can say is best support seen so far. With huge incoming support requests popping up every seconds, support never get tired and always very pleasant with users.
item.content:encoded: Your team I can say is best support seen so far. With huge incoming support requests popping up every seconds, support never get tired and always very pleasant with users.

item.title: By: Michael Michael
item.dc:creator: Michael Michael
item.description: I am excited about the strides we are making. I hope our wallet hits the top spot soon.
item.content:encoded: I am excited about the strides we are making. I hope our wallet hits the top spot soon.
